name: SendInvoiceEmail
description:
Email an invoice to a customer with optional content customization.

This tool is used to email an invoice to a customer. It can be called when there's a need to send invoice details via email, optionally allowing custom content. If no custom content is provided, default mail content will be used.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the organization to which the invoice is linked. This ID is required to specify which organization's invoice is being emailed.

parameters.name: invoice_identifier
parameters.description: Unique string identifier for the specific invoice to be emailed.

parameters.name: invoice_email_attachments
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of file paths to attach to the email. Provide file paths if additional files need to be included with the invoice email.

value_schema.description: Files to be attached to the email

parameters.name: custom_email_content
parameters.description: JSON string for custom email content including sender information, recipients, subject, and body.

send_from_org_email_id.description: Boolean to trigger the email from the organization's email address

to_mail_ids.description: Array of email address of the recipients.

cc_mail_ids.description: Array of email address of the recipients to be cced.

parameters.name: send_customer_statement
parameters.description: Set to 'True' to send the customer statement PDF with the email.

value_schema.description: Send customer statement pdf a with email.

parameters.name: send_invoice_attachment
parameters.description: Set to true to attach the invoice with the email; false to exclude it.

value_schema.description: Send the invoice attachment a with the email.
